cards.title: SSHaking
cards.content:
Universal SSH client app for iOS and macOS, implemented with SwiftUI and MacCatalyst.
* Multi-tab SSH experience that is optimized for iPadOS and macOS.
* Widgets to quickly connect to pinned hosts.
* Securely store and validate credentials like SSH keys, accounts and host fingerprints.
* Support shortcuts that can run scripts instantly.
* Sync hosts, credentials and shortcuts through iCloud.
* Backed by the same [terminal](https://xtermjs.org) that powers VSCode.

cards.title: ChromaX
cards.content:
ChromaX is a tiny app that controls Chroma light effects on Mac.
* UI is written in pure SwiftUI.
* Driver layer implemented in IOKit (C + Objective-C).
* Support modern Razer devices on macOS.

cards.title: MDNotes
cards.content:
A minimal yet powerful markdown editor.
* Built with SwiftUI and UIKit.
* Optimized for latest iPadOS, including desktop-class toolbar, split screen and multi window support.
* Performant native text editor with syntax highlight, customized theme and font, realtime markdown preview.
* Export to multiple formats like PDF, HTML, image and webarchive.
* Built-in LaTeX editor and formula renderer.

cards.title: GameGrid
cards.content:
A full-stack web app that helps you generate a grid of your favorite video games.
* **45M** requests, **1M** PVs, peak **300qps** within 2 weeks of launch.
* Built with React, Next.js and Golang, deployed on Azure.
* Integrated with SteamGridDB to fetch game covers.
* Stores user progress in `localStorage`.
* Ton of social network exposures. Some popular discussions/articles (zh-CN): [zhihu](https://www.zhihu.com/question/583691939) [yystv](https://www.yystv.cn/p/10453)

cards.title: Assetool
cards.content: A lightweight (1.8MB) native app that helps you easily generate `iconset` and `imageset` that can be directly dragged into Xcode. Implemented in SwiftUI and ImageIO frameworks. Non-UI logic is open source as a Swift Package and a command line tool, also purely implemented in Swift.

cards.title: WePeiYang
cards.content: The official iOS app of Tianjin University (Peiyang University).

cards.title: WenJin
cards.content: A question and answer community that is based on local universities. Gained over 10,000 active users.

cards.title: TipCalc
cards.content: A powerful personal finance app that helps you track all your bills. Directly calculate tip or split bill in notification center or through 3D touch, and view your data statistics in graphs and charts.
